mapper.insert:
insert into tb_status_flow_record (work_user_code, work_user_name, content, remark, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, enable, acl_code, def_type, group_id ) VALUES
(#{item.workUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.aclCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.defType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
